articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Thai King
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Thai King
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Maha Vajiralongkorn, king of Thailand, on Friday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Upon hearing the news that Your Majesty ascended to the throne as king of Thailand, I extend warm congratulations and warm greetings to you and, through you, to your family and the Thai people.
					
					 Your Majesty's enthronement as king is an expression of the Thai people's deep respect and trust in the respected Your Majesty.
					
					 Expressing belief that that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between our two countries will continue to develop on good terms in the future under your deep care, I heartily wish Your Majesty success in your noble work for the security and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Montenegro
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Montenegro
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Friday sent a congratulatory message to Dusko Markovic on his appointment as prime minister of Montenegro.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for the country's development, expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would favorably develop in the common interests.

articles.title: Senior Party Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 8th UAWK Congress
articles.content:
Senior Party Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 8th UAWK Congress
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Vice-Chairmen of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Saturday visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK).
					 Kim Ki Nam, Kwak Pom Gi and senior officials of the WPK Central Committee and the UAWK Central Committee met with the participants in the congress.
					
					 They congratulated the officials and members of the UAWK and other agricultural workers participating in the congress after performing merits in the work for developing the union into the militant ranks faithful to the party and the leader and carrying out the party's agricultural policy.
					
					 They requested the participants to further glorify the idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building the Juche-oriented UAWK and make contributions to bringing about a radical turn in the union's work as demanded by the new era of the Juche revolution under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Forces' Provocation Can Never Save Park Geun Hye: CPRC Policy Department Spokesman
articles.content:
S. Korean Forces' Provocation Can Never Save Park Geun Hye: CPRC Policy Department Spokesman
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK released a statement on Saturday as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet regime is getting desperate in military provocation against the DPRK recently, hyping the "security crisis."
					 Bosses of the south Korean military including the minister of Defense and the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, are frequenting frontline units and special warfare units near the Military Demarcation Line, where they cry out for "full combat-readiness" for launching tough and resolute punishment to cope with "threat of provocation from the north," the statement said, and went on:
					
					 They let warships and drones infiltrate into the territorial waters and air of the DPRK and staged a large-scale live shell firing drill in the hot spot of the West Sea to persistently increase military tensions on the ground and in the waters and air.
					
					 They convened a meeting of major commanders of the puppet armed forces 20 odd days earlier though it had been scheduled for December.   Meetings of commanders of various services of the puppet army are being held to hatch plots of military provocation. They are spreading rumors about "instability" across south Korea, hyping "grave security situation created due to possible provocation by the north taking advantage of the administrative vacancy in the south" and "imminent nuclear and missile tests by the north."
					
					 Lurking behind this is a sly trick to invent at any cost a case of armed clash between the north and the south by irritating the DPRK, quell the south Korean people's struggle for ousting Park Geun Hye under that pretext and thus save traitor Park from the abyss of ruin.
					
					 There is no guarantee that the Park regime that has been driven to a tight corner would not launch a provocation of war as its last-ditch attempt, and it is only the Korean nation including the south Korean people that will fall victim to it thereof.
					
					 No matter how desperately Park and the conservative group move to stay in power under the pretext of "security," they can never escape their fated doom.

articles.title: Park Group Hit for Trying to Offer More Funds to U.S. Forces in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Group Hit for Trying to Offer More Funds to U.S. Forces in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet Agency of Defense Affairs expressed its will to comply with the demand of the new U.S. administration for increased upkeep of the U.S. forces.
					 The 197th joint meeting on the "agreement on the U.S. forces' status in south Korea" held in Seoul discussed the issue of raising electricity rate for the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea but it was turned down and the south Korean side agreed to receive much lower rate than what is paid by the dwelling houses and ordinary institutions in south Korea.
					
					 The "special group to visit the U.S." made up of lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" plans to fly into the U.S. on Dec. 5 to hold a bargaining over the issue of upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea with the new U.S. administration. 
					
					 A spokesman for the North-side Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes in a statement on Saturday terms this a disgraceful action taken by special servants prolonging their remaining days, the puppet group which are steeped in sycophancy to the marrow of their bones, feeling proud of being colonial servants of the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea have inflicted unspeakable misfortune, pain and shame on the south Korean people, occupying half of our land for more than seven decades, the statement says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces are foolish guys as they kowtow to these gangsters, even providing funds collected from the people as taxes, far from driving them out of south Korea.
					
					 Such group of traitors can never be pardoned as they do not turn even a hair while offer those funds to their master just to please him.

articles.title: IFRC President Arrives
articles.content:
IFRC President Arrives
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Tadateru Konoe, president of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and his party arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Swedish Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Swedish Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Institute for Security and Development Policy of Sweden led by Director Niklas Swanstrom left here for home on Saturday. 
					 During the stay in Pyongyang, members of the delegation visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to them and toured Mangyongdae, the birthplace of the President, the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm and the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					  They exchanged views on matters of mutual concern such as the issue of the Korean peninsula with officials of the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of External Economic Relations and the National Peace Committee of Korea and expressed their understanding on the principled stand of the DPRK regarding the Korean issue.

articles.title: Participants of 8th UAWK Congress Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participants of 8th UAWK Congress Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday to pay tribute to them.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues and made bows in deep reverence and yearning for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who pioneered the Juche-based movement of peasants and founded the UAWK.

articles.title: DPRK Team Takes First Place in 2016 U-20 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Takes First Place in 2016 U-20 Women's World Cup
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team grabbed the trophy of the 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup after trouncing its French rival 3:1 in the finals on Saturday.

articles.title: Large Number of Dwelling Houses Built in DPRK
articles.content:
Large Number of Dwelling Houses Built in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Tens of thousands of dwelling houses have been built throughout the DPRK this year, thanks to the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to the people.
					 At least 11 900 dwelling houses were completed in the flood-hit areas and hundreds of houses in Puryong, Hwadae and other counties and cities of North Hamgyong Province. And few-storied and single-storied houses for hundreds of families came into being in Kangryong County and multi-storied 200-odd homes in the township of Paechon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Hundreds of new dwelling houses also appeared in the Ryongjon Fruit Farm, Pukchong County of South Hamgyong Province, Jwawi Co-op Farm, Suan County of North Hwanghae Province and Sujin-ri, Uiju County of North Phyongan Province.

articles.title: Ryongwang Senior Secondary School in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Ryongwang Senior Secondary School in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Ryongwang Senior Secondary School in Central District of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is well-known over the country for its high-quality mathematics education.
					 Its teachers have introduced various teaching methods for growing pupils' cognition of mathematical conceptions and generalized them throughout the country. One of them is to put interesting mathematical questions associated with everyday life and let pupils check the correctness of their answers in comparison with solutions. 
					
					 And they also invented experimental apparatuses and teaching aids which proved very effective in mathematics education.
					
					 As a result, the number of teachers honored with the October 8 Model Professor is on a steady increase at the school.

articles.title: S. Koreans Will Emerge Victorious in Their Struggle for Justice: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Koreans Will Emerge Victorious in Their Struggle for Justice: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The massive anti-"government" candlelight actions being staged by the south Korean people is a manifestation of their resolute will to transform the old and corrupt political landscape and achieve social justice and progress, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The candlelight held up by south Koreans represents an unquenchable torch of victory, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is making desperate efforts to dampen the fighting spirit of the south Korean people and tide over its ruling crisis.
					
					 The conservative group has betrayed its scenario for fascist suppression, terming the actions of people for justice "actions with candlelight that will die in the wind" and "attempt of the pro-north group to seize 'power.'" The ultra-right conservative bodies in south Korea such as "Oboi Association" which have desperately challenged progress and justice at Park's beck and call are working hard to chill the anti-"government" sentiments of angry south Koreans of various circles by holding "pro-government" rallies.
					
					 But such blatant challenge is only triggering off bitterer hatred and resentment of south Koreans at the regime.
					
					 The candle light put up by the south Korean people will never die in any storm and stress but will rage more furiously as a torch of victory to put an end to the reactionary rule of the conservative group and illuminate a new world of justice and democracy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Censures S. Korean Military's Moves to Save Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Censures S. Korean Military's Moves to Save Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean military held what it called a meeting of major commanders of the armed forces, touting "complicated and grave security situation." At the meeting Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense, cried out for a "resolute punishment," asserting that "nuclear and missile threat from the north has been put on an actual, high-pitched and accelerated basis" and "there is high likelihood of north's strategic and operational provocation." The puppet chiefs of staffs of the south Korean navy and air force were busy inspecting units, where they let out a string of bellicose remarks like "escalating threat of provocation by the north" and "firm combat readiness." 
					 Against this backdrop, the south Korean puppet navy staged maneuvers in the east, west and south seas of Korea under the signboard of "coping with possible naval provocation from the north" six years since the Yonphyong Island incident. The Command for the Defense of Northwestern Islands staged a naval firing drill around the islands.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 The ill-boding military moves and reckless war hysteria of the south Korean puppet military are part of its military operations to save the old witch of Chongwadae from the abyss of ruin.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is now stuck in a bottomless quagmire. Hence, the south Korean puppet military is getting frantic with military provocations to give the Park group a breathing spell.
					
					 The Park group of traitors can never go unpunished as it is unhesitatingly resorting to dangerous saber-rattling threatening the destiny of the nation in a bid to stay in power.
					
					 Only miserable death awaits the Park group keen on war moves against the north.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Failure of U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Failure of U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Public in the U.S. is becoming increasingly critical of its hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					 Recently media and experts on Korean affairs in the U.S. comment that the DPRK supreme leader's continued visits to army units reflect the will to take strong counteraction against the U.S. sanctions and pressure and the U.S. and its followers' policy toward the DPRK totally failed.
					
					 According to Google News on Nov. 20, most of 14 security experts gave C, D and F marks to the Obama administration's DPRK policy and a person who gave F to Obama said that the DPRK policy of the Obama administration, south Korea, Japan and other allies was a dead duck.
					
					 This is a bitter derision at the U.S. and other hostile forces that were driven to the fate of falling leaves in the autumn wind by the strong will and matchless pluck of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The greatness of one country and one nation depends on its leader.
					
					 The leader's steadfast revolutionary faith, matchless pluck and will are the source of the nation's strength and the weapon more powerful than A-bomb.
					
					 The great leader with gifted wisdom, outstanding insight and iron-will is able to steer the country to the access to nukes and make it as strategic line as he has noble sense of responsibility for ever-lasting future of the country and the nation.
					
					 The strategic position of the DPRK as a nuclear power in the East is the precious fruition of the strong will, tireless efforts and wise leadership of the outstanding brilliant Songun commander.
					
					 The Obama administration has persistently made desperate efforts to bring down the system in the DPRK under the signboard of "strategic patience" for eight years, but it compelled the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrence and emerge a nuclear power.
					
					 This year alone, the DPRK succeeded in its first H-bomb test and nuclear warhead explosion test in September startling the world people and striking terror into the enemies. 
					
					 The successful test-fire of surface to surface medium- and long-range strategic rocket Hwasong-10 and test-fire of SLBM awakened the U.S. and its following forces to the fact that they cannot have a sound sleep now.
					
					 In the final analysis, Obama gave the DPRK the status of a nuclear power, thus being responsible for sustaining a total failure in the policy toward the DPRK by driving the security of the U.S. mainland at greatest peril. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the changed strategic position of the DPRK.

articles.title: Repeal of Fascist Law Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of Fascist Law Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for the Abolition of the "Security Law" in south Korea demanded called a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 1 in demand of the repeal of the fascist law, according to the south Korean online newspaper Voice of People.
					 Speakers said that the Park Geun Hye regime could monopolize "state affairs" by invoking such evil law as the "Security Law".
					
					 They contended that the SL should be abrogated without fail in order to ensure democracy, human rights, the people's right to existence, peace and reunification.
					
					 They also demanded an immediate release of the prisoners of conscience now detained by force of the evil law.

articles.title: More Vigorous Struggle for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Vigorous Struggle for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Tongil News, the People's Emergency Action for Bringing down the Park Geun Hye Regime in south Korea held a conference of action for Park Geun Hye's ouster in Seoul Thursday as a reaction to her third talk to the people.
					 The conference demanded an immediate resignation, arrest and investigation into Park and the dissolution of the "Saenuri Party."
					
					 Speakers from different civic and social organizations expressed their resolve to wage struggles of higher stage on Dec. 3 and 10, saying that the will of the south Korean people to achieve democracy shook the whole of south Korea, making victory visible.
					
					 The Action made public a resolution, which declared that Dec. 3 is set as the "day of Park Geun Hye's immediate resignation" and intensive struggles would be waged in addition to the candlelight rallies across south Korea and a massive all-people action be staged on Dec. 10, too.

articles.title: Actions to Oust Park Geun Hye Staged across S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions to Oust Park Geun Hye Staged across S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- South Koreans, infuriated by traitor Park Geun Hye's third "talk to the people" aimed at deceiving the public and prolonging her remaining days, have reportedly continued to stage actions calling for Park's resignation.
					 There took place actions for ouster of Park across south Korea on Nov. 30 with over 350,000 people from all walks of life involved.
					
					 Rallies and demos were staged in various parts of Seoul to protest against Park, Choe Sun Sill, big businesses, the "Saenuri Party" and Chongwadae.
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society filed complaints with the "National Assembly" against Park, Choe and Cha Un Thaek for bribery. 
					
					 Poor people's organizations have continued to wage a sit-in strike in Kwanghwamun plaza since Nov. 30 together with the disabled.
					
					 There took place actions demanding Park's resignation and disbandment of the "Saenuri Party" in various places on Friday.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Demands Repeal of "Security Law"
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Demandd Repeal of "Security Law"
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean on-line newspaper Voice of People in an editorial on Dec. 1 marking the lapse of 68 years since the fabrication of the fascist "Security Law" said that the successive dictatorial regimes, including the Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-hee regimes, invoked the law for eliminating the opposition political forces and suppressing democratic figures.
					 The same can be said of the Park Geun Hye regime, it said, adding:
					
					 The regime is touting "followers of the north", "coloring theory" and "backstage forces" when all the people are chanting slogans demanding the ouster of Park. It is because the SL still remains in force. 
					
					 This evil law should be repealed at once with the ouster of Park regime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on Nov. 25 carried a detailed gist of "Let Us Further Intensify the Work of the Women's Union under the Banner of Modelling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism", a letter of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					 The work, published on Nov. 17 Juche 105 (2016), clarifies that the Korean women's movement is a Juche-based movement which was pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and has covered a glorious course of development under the guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 And it clarifies the tasks and ways for the union to make positive contributions to accomplishing the cause of socialism, the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il were held in Germany, Bangladesh, Thailand, Benin and South Africa Nov. 11-27.
					 The chairpersons of the German Communist Party and the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that Kim Jong Il had led to victory the socialist construction and the drive for national reunification and the cause of human independence holding aloft the banner of independence, Songun and socialism and made ceaseless journey of field guidance for the people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The chairman of the C.C., Workers Party of Bangladesh and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il's exploits, saying that he developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force, the DPRK into an invincible socialist bulwark and the Korean People's Army into mighty revolutionary ranks.
					
					 The chairman of the Thai Committee for Remembering HE Kim Jong Il said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il defended socialism and laid a firm foundation for the building of a socialist power with arms.
					
					 Under his leadership, the DPRK turned into a satellite-manufacturing and -launching nation and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The exploits he performed for the triumphant advance of the DPRK and the cause of national reunification are the most precious wealth to be glorified through generations.
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that it was the steadfast will and faith of leader Kim Jong Il to bring earlier what can be brought earlier from the future as much as possible by providing restlessly the treasures of national value for the country and posterity in any difficulties and that his life was the noble and devoted life as he dedicated his all to the country and the people.
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the remembrance meeting held in South Africa.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Bangladesh on Nov. 20.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladeshi Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits such as a remembrance meeting, seminar, film show and photo exhibition on the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita al Rey de Tailandia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita al Rey de Tailandia
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, remitio la vispera un mensaje de felicitacion al Rey de Tailandia, Maha Vajiralongkorn. 
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Informado de que Su Majestad fue ascendido como Rey de Tailandia, le extiendo cordiales felicitaciones y saludos que hago extensivos a la familia real y al pueblo tailandes.
					
					Su ascension al trono deviene una expresion de alto respeto y confianza que deposita el pueblo tailandes en Su Majestad.
					
					Convencido de que bajo la profunda atencion de Su Majestad, seguiran desarrollandose positivamente en el futuro tambien las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises que tienen larga historia y tradicion, formulo sinceros votos por los exitos en sus nobles tareas por la seguridad y prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae se entrevista con la Television Cubana
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae se entrevista con la Television Cubana
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Se entrevisto el dia primero con la Television Cubana Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, quien esta de visita en la Republica de Cuba para expresar condolencias por el deceso del Comandante en Jefe de la Revolucion Cubana, Fidel Castro Ruz, presidiendo la delegacion del partido y el Estado de la RPDC.
					Informado del fallecimiento del companero Fidel Castro, el pueblo coreano esta muy entristecido al igual que el pueblo cubano, comenzo Choe y prosiguio:
					
					El deceso del lider cubano significa una gran perdida para los partidos, gobiernos y pueblo de ambos paises. 
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, realizo una visita a la Embajada de Cuba en nuestro pais para expresar las condolencias por el deceso del companero Fidel Castro Ruz. 
					
					Con motivo del fallecimiento del lider cubano, fue proclamado en nuestro pais el periodo de condolencias y los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito y los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron la sede diplomatica cubana para expresar las condolencias. 
					
					Esto testimonia claramente las relaciones de amistad de caracter fraternal y combativo entre los dos paises. 
					
					Fidel Castro era intimo amigo y viejo companero revolucionario de armas del pueblo coreano.
					
					Durante su estancia en nuestro pais en marzo del 75 (1986) de la Era Juche, el sostuvo cordiales encuentros con el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Hizo todo lo posible para fortalecer y desarrollar la solidaridad combativa y la amistad entre los pueblos de Corea y Cuba que se encuentran juntos en la primera linea de lucha antiimperialista.
					
					Las relaciones de amistad entre Corea y Cuba preparadas por los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il junto con el companero Fidel Castro Ruz se consolidaran y se desarrollaran invariablemente bajo la profunda atencion de los estimados companeros Kim Jong Un y Raul Castro Ruz. 
					
					Estamos convencidos de que el hermano pueblo cubano superara el dolor de haber perdido a su destacado lider y defendera con firmeza la patria, la revolucion y el socialismo y lograra la prosperidad del pais, bajo la orientacion del companero Raul Castro y en acato a los legados de su lider fallecido.

articles.title: MINREX organiza encuentro de informacion para representantes diplomaticos
articles.content:
MINREX organiza encuentro de informacion para representantes diplomaticos
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea organizo la vispera un encuentro de informacion para los representantes diplomaticos en Corea en relacion con que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fabrico el 30 de noviembre nueva "resolucion de sancion" contra la RPDC.
					En la ocasion, el vicecanciller Han Song Ryol se refirio a la posicion de principios de la RPDC respecto a la "resolucion de sancion".
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad fabrico la "resolucion de sancion" acusando la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear realizada en septiembre pasado por nuestro pais, comenzo Han y prosiguio:
					
					La RPDC rechaza totalmente la aprobacion de ese documento considerandola de otro acto de abuso de autoridad por el Consejo de Seguridad y de atentado contra la soberania que significa la negativa total a nuestro derecho a la autodefensa.
					
					El problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana fue causado por Estados Unidos y este pais forzo a la RPDC a la posesion de armas nucleares.
					
					En septiembre pasado, se llevo a cabo con exito la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear como parte de las contramedidas sustanciales frente a la amenaza nuclear y la campana de sancion de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles que cuestionan brutalmente el ejercicio del derecho de autodefensa de nuestro Estado. Ademas, constituye una manifestacion de la voluntad intransigente de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que estan dispuestos a contraatacar a los enemigos si estos se atreven a atacarnos.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no tiene ninguna autoridad para prohibir el ejercicio del derecho a autodefensa de un Estado soberano, incluso la prueba nuclear y demas medidas para el mejoramiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional. Y ni en la Carta de la ONU ni en ningun derecho internacional hay el articulo que haya definido la prueba nuclear como amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales.
					
					Por esta razon, el Secretariado de la ONU no puede dar todavia ninguna respuesta a la carta del representante coreano ante la ONU, remitida en mayo pasado al secretario general de la ONU solicitandole aclarar las contradicciones juridicas que entrana la "resolucion de sancion" contra la RPDC.
					
					Se comprueba con hechos que fue una opcion muy sensata y justa que la RPDC haya preparado el poderoso disuasivo nuclear presentando el armamento nuclear como linea estatal y superando todas las dificultades.
					
					Estarian muy equivocados si Obama y sus subordinados piensan que podran hacer a la RPDC renunciar la linea de armamento nuclear o socavar su posicion de potencia nuclear mediante la sucia campana de sancion y presion. 
					
					La fabricacion de la presente "resolucion de sancion", que niega la soberania y el derecho a la existencia y al desarrollo de nuestro pais, causara las contramedidas mas fuertes de autodefensa.
					
					Los representantes diplomaticos dijeron que llegaron a tener la opinion clara sobre la posicion de la RPDC respecto a la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad.

articles.title: Portavoz del Departamento de Politica de CRPP revela intento de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz del Departamento de Politica de CRPP revela intento de titeres surcoreanos 
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que la banda titere surcoreana recurre febrilmente a las provocaciones militares contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea infundiendo el clima de "crisis de seguridad", el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 3 una declaracion.
					El ministro de Defensa Nacional, el presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor y otros caudillos del circulo militar surcoreano visitan casi todos los dias las unidades de batalla especial y las otras enclavadas en los alrededores de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar instruyendoles "mantener la disposicion de represalia fuerte y rotunda contra la amenaza de provocacion del Norte de Corea".
					
					Asimismo, enviaron los buques de combate y drones a las zonas maritimas y el espacio aereo jurisdiccional de la RPDC y desarrollaron en las zonas candentes del Mar Oeste los ejercicios de tiro de canones, de manera que se agravara gradualmente la tension militar en la tierra, el mar y el aire, revela la nota y continua: 
					
					Y convocaron mas de 20 dias antes la reunion de los comandantes importantes de todo el ejercito, prevista para diciembre, y trazan los complots de provocacion militar en las reuniones de comandantes de diferentes tipos de ejercito. 
					
					Por otra parte, generan intencionalmente en la sociedad surcoreana la "inquietud sobre la seguridad" difundiendo el rumor de que "es grave la situacion de seguridad debido a la provocacion que pueda cometer el Norte aprovechando el vacio de la administracion estatal" y "es inminente la prueba nuclear y de misil del Norte". 
					
					Tales actos parten de la artimana astuta para causar un sensacional incidente de choque armado entre ambas partes coreanas al irritar a la RPDC y utilizarlo como pretexto para reprimir a la poblacion surcoreana levantada en la lucha por la dimision de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Asi pretenden sacar a la traidora Park de la crisis de arruinamiento al trasladar el enfoque de la opinion publica al problema de "seguridad".
					
					No hay garantia de que la banda de Park, que se encuentra ahora entre la espada y la pared, no va a desatar la guerra como ultimo remedio. En este caso, la unica victima sera la nacion coreana, inclusive la poblacion surcoreana. 
					
					Aunque la traidora y sus compinches conservadores estan desesperados para mantener el poder creando deliberadamente la "crisis de seguridad", no podran salvar su destino a punto de arruinamiento tragico.

articles.title: Portavoz de Jonminthukwi denuncia proceder vendepatria de banda surcoreana
articles.content:
Portavoz de Jonminthukwi denuncia proceder vendepatria de banda surcoreana
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la Agencia de Asuntos de Defensa del Sur de Corea expreso la voluntad de aceptar si la nueva administracion estadounidense demanda el aumento de los gastos para el mantenimiento de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea.
					En la 197a "reunion conjunta del convenio sobre la posicion de tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea", sesionada en Seul, fue rechazado el problema de alzar la tarifa de electricidad para esos uniformados y se acordo cobrarles en el proximo ano tambien el precio inferior al que paga una casa u organo normal del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Ademas, el "grupo de enviados especiales de visita a EE.UU.", compuesto por los parlamentarios por el Partido Saenuri, viajara el dia 5 a EE.UU. para discutir con la nueva administracion una serie de problemas, incluso el de gastos para el mantenimiento de militares norteamericanos. 
					
					En una declaracion publicada el dia 3, el portavoz de la Direccion Nortena del Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas (Jonminthukwi) califica esos hechos de actos vendepatrias y proyanquis que puede cometer solo la banda titere surcoreana, sirviente colonial y lacaya fiel de EE.UU. 
					
					Durante mas de 70 anos, las tropas norteamericanas ocupan la mitad del territorio patrio imponiendo incontables sufrimientos, desgracias y verguenzas a la poblacion surcoreana, lamenta la nota.
					
					No se puede tolerar mas a los traidores surcoreanos que lejos de expulsar a esos gangsteres extranjeros, les mantienen como huespedes distinguidos gastando enormes sumas recaudadas como sanguijuelas a los habitantes por concepto de impuestos, concluye.
